articles.title: NASA Power Play: Astronauts Finish Installing Roll-Out Solar Array in Record-Tying Spacewalk - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA astronauts, Woody Hoburg and Steve Bowen, successfully installed a new solar array on the International Space Station during a 5-hour spacewalk, boosting power production. This marked Bowen's tenth spacewalk, tying the record for most U.S. spacewalks. Ex…
articles.content:
ByNASAJune 15, 2023
A view of the new roll-out solar array unfolding after NASA astronauts Steve Bowen and Woody Hoburg successfully installed it to the 1B power channel on June 15, 2023. Credit: NA… [+4419 chars]

articles.title: Mercedes drivers can soon turn to ChatGPT for voice control - HT Tech
articles.description: Mercedes-Benz said U.S. drivers could power some of their luxury vehicles with ChatGPT in a test program starting June 16.
articles.content:
ChatGPT will soon hit the road.
Mercedes-Benz on Thursday said U.S. drivers could power some of their luxury vehicles with ChatGPT in a test program starting June 16.

articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 15 June 2023: M15 Globular Star Cluster snapped by Hubble - HT Tech
articles.description: Today’s NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is a breathtaking snapshot of M15, a globular star cluster that is located about 33600 light-years away towards the constellation of Pegasus.
